description: Alan Scott is the first Green Lantern, a powerful protector of Earth wielding a magical ring.
name: ALAN SCOTT

description: Alfred Pennyworth is Bruce Wayne's loyal butler, serving as a mentor and close confidant to Batman.
name: ALFRED PENNYWORTH

description: Amanda Waller is the tough and resourceful leader of Task Force X, also known as the Suicide Squad.
name: AMANDA WALLER

description: Amethyst is the princess of Gemworld, a magical realm filled with mystical powers and fierce enemies.
name: AMETHYST

description: Anarky is a vigilante with a deep hatred for corruption, often blurring the lines between hero and villain.
name: ANARKY

description: The Anti-Monitor is a cosmic entity of immense power, known for bringing destruction to entire universes.
name: ANTI MONITOR

description: Antiope is a fierce Amazonian warrior, known for her incredible combat skills and unwavering loyalty.
name: ANTIOPE

description: Aquaman, the King of Atlantis, possesses superhuman strength and the ability to communicate with marine life.
name: AQUAMAN

description: Ares, the God of War, thrives on conflict and chaos, often clashing with Wonder Woman and other heroes.
name: ARES

description: Arsenal, also known as Roy Harper, is a skilled archer and fighter, formerly a sidekick to Green Arrow.
name: ARSELNAL

description: Atlanna, Queen of Atlantis, is the mother of Aquaman and a key figure in the underwater kingdom.
name: ATLANNA

description: Atom, a brilliant scientist, uses advanced technology to shrink himself to subatomic sizes.
name: ATOM

description: Atom Smasher is a metahuman with the ability to alter his size and density, giving him immense strength.
name: ATOM SMASHER

description: Atrocitus is the leader of the Red Lantern Corps, fueled by rage and wielding a ring of blood energy.
name: ATROCITUS

description: Bane is a powerful villain known for his incredible strength and tactical intelligence, often opposing Batman.
name: BANE

description: Batgirl, a skilled fighter and detective, is a key ally in Batman's war on crime in Gotham City.
name: BATGIRL

description: Batman, the Dark Knight, is a master detective and martial artist dedicated to protecting Gotham City.
name: BATMAN

description: Batwoman is a highly skilled vigilante, fighting crime with her wit, strength, and advanced technology.
name: BATWOMAN

description: Beast Boy has the unique ability to transform into any animal, making him a valuable member of the Teen Titans.
name: BEAST BOY

description: Big Barda, a warrior from Apokolips, escaped to Earth and fights alongside the New Gods for justice.
name: BIG BARDA
